attributes.action: Abolish the tax on pension funds that has left many in defecit and penalises the members of said funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This TAx is Robbing funds of 5 Billion pounds annually and causing schemes to close due to huge deficits. We are already taxed on everthing while we work and contribute to these funds so this is another stealth tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
